content: A `Switch` is used for an on/off state. It can have a `label` and supports a `isDisabled` state.
The Switch can be styled with `size` and `color` props. Icons can be added to the thumb (`thumbIcon`) or to the start/end of the component (`startContent`/`endContent`).
A Switch can be a controlled component. Use the `isSelected` prop to set its state and the `onValueChange` event to handle changes.
